member.name: T:WebcamControl.Webcam
member.summary: Webcam

member.name: P:WebcamControl.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:WebcamControl.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.VideoFileFormat
member.summary: Gets the video format in which the webcam video will be saved.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.SnapshotFormat
member.summary: Gets or Sets format used when saving snapshot of webcam image.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.VideoDevice
member.summary: Gets or Sets the name of the video device to be used.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.AudioDevice
member.summary: Gets or Sets the name of the audio device to be used.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.VideoDirectory
member.summary: Gets or Sets the folder where the recorded webcam video will be saved.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.ImageDirectory
member.summary: Gets or Sets the folder where video snapshot will be saved.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.FrameRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the frame rate, in frames per second. Default value is 15.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.FrameSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the video profile. Default is 320x240.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.IsRecording
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether video recording is taking place.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.ImagenMarcaAgua
member.summary: Gets or Sets the folder where video snapshot will be saved.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.NombreVideo
member.summary: Gets or Sets the folder where video snapshot will be saved.

member.name: P:WebcamControl.Webcam.WfVisibilityImg
member.summary: Gets or Sets the folder where video snapshot will be saved.

member.name: M:WebcamControl.Webcam.StartPreview
member.summary: Displays webcam video.

member.name: M:WebcamControl.Webcam.StopPreview
member.summary: Stops the display of webcam video.

member.name: M:WebcamControl.Webcam.StartRecording
member.summary: Starts the recording of webcam images to a video file.

member.name: M:WebcamControl.Webcam.StopRecording
member.summary: Stops the recording of webcam video.

member.name: M:WebcamControl.Webcam.TakeSnapshot
member.summary: Takes a snapshot of an webcam image. The size of the image will be equal to the size of the control.
